alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Laurel; Pulaski; Rockcastle; Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 11:58PM EDT until June 26 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Wayne County in south central Kentucky... Central Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1158 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rockford to Hiatt to near Science Hill to Cains Store to near Columbia, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Mount Vernon around 1205 AM EDT. Dudley Station around 1210 AM EDT. Robinet around 1215 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Somerset, Deese and Dykes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
